Hunter Infrared Goggles (for Female)
Lunettes infrarouges de chasseur (pour femme)
Jäger-Infrarotbrille (Damen)
Occhiali a infrarossi da cacciatore (da Donna)
Gafas de infrarrojos de cazador (para mujer)
*Not Localised* Female01_Glasses_Yeti_Hunter
사냥꾼의 적외선 고글 (여성)
Hunter Infrared Goggles (Women)
獵人紅外線護目鏡（女用）
獵人紅外線護目鏡（女用）
Hunter Infrared Goggles (for Female)
kDesc
Seems you can spot a Yeti at five hundred paces. Accept these goggles as payment for thinning the herd. [#Legal]
Apparemment, vous pouvez repérer un yéti à 500 pas. Recevez ces lunettes pour vous remercier d'avoir réduit leur nombre. [#Legal]
Es scheint, als könntest du einen Yeti aus 500 Metern Entfernung erkennen. Hier hast du eine Brille als Belohnung für das Beseitigen dieser Biester. [#Legal]
A quanto pare riesci a vedere uno yeti a 500 passi. Accetta questi occhiali come ricompensa per aver diminuito il branco. [#Legal]
Parece que puedes ver un yeti a quinientos pasos. Acepta estas gafas como recompensa por diezmarlos. [#Legal]
*Not Localised* Female01_Glasses_Yeti_Hunter [#Legal]
500보 밖에서도 설인이 보이나 보군요. 설인 무리의 규모를 줄인 일에 대한 보상으로 이 고글을 받으세요. [#Legal]
Seems you can spot a Yeti at five hundred paces. Accept these goggles as payment for thinning the herd. [#Legal]
看來您能看到五百步以外的傳說的喜馬拉雅山雪人。收下這副護目鏡，作為協助剷除劣等物種的工資。[#Legal]
看來您能看到五百步以外的傳說的喜馬拉雅山雪人。收下這副護目鏡，作為協助剷除劣等物種的工資。[#Legal]
Seems you can spot a Yeti at five hundred paces. Accept these goggles as payment for thinning the herd. [#Legal]
